mapper.insert: insert into topic values( #{topic_no}, #{topic_name}, #{topic_confidential}, #{topic_explain}, 'null', null, null )
mapper.select: select count(topic_name) from topic inner join ( select topic_no from topic_member where team_no= #{team_no} )T on topic.topic_no = T.topic_no where topic.topic_name = #{topic_name}
select topic_no from topic_member where team_no = #{team_no} order by topic_no asc
